ai-patthana12.15:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.15:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to the teaching for refuge.
ai-patthana12.15:1.1_2: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.15:1.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.15:2.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching to someone who has gone for refuge for life.
ai-patthana12.15:2.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.15:2.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.15:3.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.15:3.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.15:4.1_0: or acceptance of the teaching for refuge ...
ai-patthana12.15:5.1_0: They don’t take pleasure in form ...
ai-patthana12.15:6.1_0: They don’t understand the teaching for refuge, or for one without reason.
ai-patthana12.15:7.1_0: You don’t give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana12.15:8.1_0: not for refuge to the north,
ai-patthana12.15:8.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.15:8.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.15:9.1_0: or for a layperson hasn’t been approved by the Buddha,
ai-patthana12.15:9.1_1: or for a layman who isn’t known,
ai-patthana12.15:9.1_2: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.15:9.1_4: the five hindrances are not clear.
